summary: A collection of helper modules that manage the end‑to‑end workflow for bulk MAStr XML data: building download URLs, fetching and extracting zip archives, normalising and enriching the data frames with readable catalog values, and persisting the cleaned data into a relational database via pandas and SQLAlchemy.
business_intent: Enable automated, reliable acquisition and integration of the German wind turbine registry (MAStr) data into analytical databases, supporting downstream reporting and decision‑making.
